# Spry Servers Pi Week Specials!

This year, we've created a special VPS promo just for Pi. Through Saturday, March 14th (3.14), you can take advantage of the offer(s) below. While supplies last. (No specific qty limits) The discounts are recurring.


> ## Special Pi Day Deal: 
> _**SSD KVM Pi Day Special**_
> **RAM**: 3 GB
> **vCore**: 1
> **Bandwidth**: 4 TB
> **SSD Disk**: 20 GB
> **IPv4**:  1 (Upgrade-able to 8)
> **IPv6**:  /64
> **Uplink**:  1 Gbps
> **Location**: Phoenix, US | Dallas, US
> **Price**: $4/mo
> [**Order Here**](https://clik.rip/pi2020)
> 
> **All other [VPS](https://www.spryservers.net/clients/cart.php?gid=20 "VPS") are 31.4% off regular pricing!**
> Use coupon code: **LOVEPI**

**Fine Print**
>!> Discounts void if similar configuration is cancelled within 30 days. Not valid for upgrades. Discount will not carry over if upgraded at a later time.
